thread.title: Ultraman Toymaker Bloks to Debut in HK After Frenzy Over IPO
thread.title_full: Ultraman Toymaker Bloks to Debut in HK After Frenzy Over IPO

author: Bloomberg News
title: Ultraman Toymaker Bloks to Debut in HK After Frenzy Over IPO
text:
Shares of
The stock is poised to rise, if over-the-counter activity is of any indication. Shanghai-based Bloks surged more than 70% late Thursday from its IPO price of HK$60.35 a share, according to a KGI Securities gray-market platform.
The frenzy over Bloks — demand from mom-and-pop investors was thousands of times higher than the number of shares reserved for them — builds on the popularity of ...
